Description: 貴方は熊鼠に運命を託した。@{M}You have cast your lot in with the rats.
LevelDescriptionText: 1|貴方は熊鼠を選んだ。~2|貴方は熊鼠と天竺鼠の間に平和をもたらせなかった。~3|貴方は熊鼠と天竺鼠の間に平和をもたらした。~4|ピグモート島に変化が訪れた。@{M}1|You chose to help the rats~3|You forged peace between the rats and cavies~2|You could not forge peace between the rats and cavies~4|Things have changed on Pigmote Isle
Name: 回顧録: 物創りの鼠達@{M}Memoirs: A Rat in the Making
